LanguageData.WesteradoScenario_Westerado.label: Westerado
LanguageData.WesteradoScenario_Westerado.description: he four of you wandered off into the world to settle a new frontier. You barely scraped by before finding this place.
LanguageData.WesteradoScenario_Westerado.scenario.sum: Four vagabonds - the not-so-classic RimWorld experience.
LanguageData.WesteradoScenario_Westerado.scenario.des: he four of you wandered off into the world to settle a new frontier. You barely scraped by before finding this place.
LanguageData.WesteradoScenario_Westerado.scenario.par: A New Frontier\n\nDriven from your earlier lives your group undertook a long and arduous journey to find a new frontier to settle. You've come across this wild and inhospitable corner of the world; will it just be another unremarkable stop in your odyssey, or a place you can finally call home?
